comments: Mr. Crumley is a very nice guy, however he has no business teaching college math. I have been in his class for about 2 months now, and honestly have not learned anything. Stat is supposed to not be a very hard class, however he does nothing but confuse me. I am having to go get tutored after class to learn what going on, and I made an A in Math1111

he\'s a really nice guy who loves to teach and answer questions. the way he teaches is kinda wierd, he gets off track sometimes but he\'s extremely graceful in his grading! do your work and show you care and you will make a good grade!

He is an EXCELLENT teacher!! Don\'t listen to those other people. They probably just didn\'t do the homework. He will always answer your questions and stick with you until you understand, if not you can go to his office and he\'ll personally help you. He takes his test question directly from HW & Chapter tests. I am NOT GOOD AT MATH and made a B!
Horrible teacher...Jumps around way too much on his technology stuff and gets everyone confused. What he teaches in class is usually not on the homework. If you like to teach yourself math go for it.
a former high school teacher who has no business teaching a college level class
